attributes.action: allow even more absolutely unrestricted immigration from the African continent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know that folks from Africa are wonderful, lovely people who are contributing immeasurably to our country and bringing us the 'enrichment of diversity'.  Current immigration controls mean that, occasionally, people from the African continent are refused entry to our country.  This should cease immediately, and all Africans should be given unrestricted access to the UK, and to all social security, health and housing benefits, even if this is at the expense of the pre-existing local population.
